      nodes - the nodes
      sectors - the sectors
      edges - the edges
      attributeSets - the set of attributes

  • Method Details

    • loadFrom

      public static Graph loadFrom(Path basePath) throws IOException
      Open the files where the data are, and extract the data. Instantiate some Objects, in order to have readable information. Finally, it returns the JaVelo graph
      Parameters:
      basePath - the path to the files
      Returns:
      a Graph object, with the data that were in the file
      Throws:
      IOException - if the file doesn't exist

    • nodeOutEdgeId

      public int nodeOutEdgeId(int nodeId, int edgeIndex)
      returns the identity of the edgeIndex-th edge coming out of the node
      Parameters:
      nodeId - the id of the node
      Returns:
      the id of an edge

    • nodeClosestTo

      public int nodeClosestTo(PointCh point, double searchDistance)
      Return the id of the closest node given a certain point. It's looking in a limited section, and if it doesn't find a node, it returns -1
      Parameters:
      point - the reference point
      searchDistance - the distance where it's doing the research
      Returns:
      the id of the closest node if it exists, otherwise -1

    • edgeTargetNodeId

      public int edgeTargetNodeId(int edgeId)

      Returns:
      the id of the target node of the edge

    • edgeIsInverted

      public boolean edgeIsInverted(int edgeId)
      Return a boolean concerning the direction of the edge
      Parameters:
      edgeId - the id of the edge
      Returns:
      true if the edge is inverted, otherwise it returns false

    • edgeProfile

      public DoubleUnaryOperator edgeProfile(int edgeId)
      Check if the edge has a profile, and return a sample function if it's the case, or Double.Nan if not
      Parameters:
      edgeId - the id of the edge
      Returns:
      a function depending on whether the edge has a profile
